cluster_classes.class_description: Groups of people that share and transmit urban legends, often motivated by mutual protection and social cohesion.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: urban legends take on a life of their own as they are shared and retold in communitiesâ€¦ By sharing these tales, communities can come together

members.entity_description: Groups of people, in both large and small settings, among whom urban legends are shared.
Groups of people sharing and transmitting urban legends to promote mutual protection.

cluster_classes.class_description: Refers to family members or close associates whom communities seek to protect, especially in the context of shared stories or legends.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: communities can come together to protect themselves and their loved ones from perceived threats

members.entity_description: Family members or close associates that communities aim to protect by sharing legends.

args.new_description: Groups of people (large or small) in which urban legends are shared, transmitted, and maintained, often for mutual protection and social cohesion.
args.new_class_group: Urban Legend Social Actors and Groups
args.justification: Renames and slightly clarifies the class to explicitly reference its domain (urban legends) and assigns a coherent Class_Group shared with related social-actor classes, without conflating communities with other actor roles.

args.new_description: Family members or close associates that communities aim to protect by sharing urban legends and related cautionary stories.
args.new_class_group: Urban Legend Social Actors and Groups
args.justification: Removes the vague 'Misc' prefix, clarifies that this class is specifically about protected individuals within the context of urban legends, and aligns it under the same Class_Group as communities while keeping it distinct as a different type of actor.

executed_decisions.new_description: Groups of people (large or small) in which urban legends are shared, transmitted, and maintained, often for mutual protection and social cohesion.
executed_decisions.new_class_group: Urban Legend Social Actors and Groups
executed_decisions.justification: Renames and slightly clarifies the class to explicitly reference its domain (urban legends) and assigns a coherent Class_Group shared with related social-actor classes, without conflating communities with other actor roles.

executed_decisions.new_description: Family members or close associates that communities aim to protect by sharing urban legends and related cautionary stories.
executed_decisions.new_class_group: Urban Legend Social Actors and Groups
executed_decisions.justification: Removes the vague 'Misc' prefix, clarifies that this class is specifically about protected individuals within the context of urban legends, and aligns it under the same Class_Group as communities while keeping it distinct as a different type of actor.
